pkgmetadata.longdescription: Type-Specific Failure Rate and Hazard Rate on Competing Risks Data // Given a failure type, the function computes covariate- specific probability of failure over time and covariate- specific conditional hazard rate based on possibly right- censored competing risk data. Specifically, it computes the non-parametric maximum-likelihood estimates of these quantities and their asymptotic variances in a semi-parametric mixture model for competing-risks data, as described in Chang et al. (2007a).
